overview: “The Power of Love” shared between two strong and masculine men in their deepest throes of passion is unmatched. The romantic odyssey begins with poolside lovers Rafael Carreras and Mitchell Rock, who have intense sex together. Vito Gallo and Alex Marte romance one another against the waves of the Aegean. Will Helm and Tony Axel experience sexual ecstasy while overlooking the Greek countryside. Michael Lucas makes secret, romantic love to Mathew Mason. And Jonathan Agassi bathes and admires Trenton Ducati’s muscular body in the sea. “The Power of Love” has never been stronger between the handsome and masculine men of Lucas Entertainment!
title: The Power of Love
